title: I have an offer with two companies like Ilantus Technologies and Robosoft Technologies. Which company should I join? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can make a list of following points: who is paying you better, what is the job role and technology you will be working on, job location, flexibility and work timings, company policies, financial stability looking at the current pandemic and all. You can check for their respective reviews on Glassdoor and then decide what is best for you as you are the best who can take up a decision after doing a research and comparing them. All the best!
